title: Switch
description: Chloe is a typical college student still deciding her future and who will be in it. After an outing with her boyfriend Daniel, they experience something terrible together that opens Chloe's eyes to a world she never believed in before. Something dark and menacing hovers over her now and forces her to step outside of her comfort zone when an opportunity arises to investigate it further. Will she ever understand what happened to her that fateful night? Will she come to grips with love lost? Or will the darkness overtake her? Find out as you get immersed in "Switch", from bestselling author Rue Volley. This short is MALVS 18+ and very graphic in nature with scenes of sex and some violence.
author: Rue Volley
